message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by its previous owners. Given its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $100. Considering its value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $120. This is an exclusive offer tailored to appreciate your interest and ensure you get the best deal possible. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a piece that offers immense value to you at a reasonable price.
